LANGUAGE.LABEL: Import Customers
The Customer Import File must be a comma delimited (CSV) format. Fields that contain commas must be contained within double quotes. Missing fields can be skipped with consecutive commas (, ,).

Each row of the file must include the Sales Campaign Number, Customer Date, Customer Name. Optional fields include the, contact first name, contact last name, Title, Email, Day Phone, Night Phone, Street, Unit, City, State, Zip, Country.
1, 1/1/2006, "Acme, Inc.", Bob, Jones, President, bob@jones.com, (214)345-9876, , 123 Main Street, , Dallas, TX, 75075, USA
Submit
